text: Bhali bhabhambilwe munshalabha, gubhagabhenenje nngubho yabho kwa shikoma, nkupinga limalile lilobhe libhalugwile ankulondola bha a Nnungu, bhashinkugabhananga nngubho yangu kwa shikoma.27:35 Majandiko gana ga bhukala gangali gene malobhega, “Nkupinga limalile lilobhe lya ankulondola bha a Nnungu, bhashinkugabhananga nngubho yangu kwa shikoma.”
